name: epitome
content:
the epitome of something
Add to word list
Add to word list
the typical or highest example of a stated quality, as shown by a particular person or thing: Even now in her sixties, she is the epitome of French elegance.

the typical or highest example of a stated quality, as shown by a particular person or thing: He was the epitome of the fashionable gentleman. epitomize verb [ T ] us
